r2dii.utils 0.0.0.9003

  • r2dii

Create paths to specific 2dii directories

Source: R/paths.R
USER.NAME.Rd

Create paths to specific 2dii directories

USER.NAME()

DROPBOX.PATH(...)

GIT.PATH(...)

WEBTOOL.PATH(...)

COMPANY.PATH(...)

dbox_port_00(...)

SCENARIO.DATA.PATH(...)

dbox_port2_10proj(...)

EQMARKET.DATA.PATH(...)

MARKET.DATA.PATH(...)

INDEX.DATA.PATH(...)

INDEX.RESULTS.DATA.PATH(...)

FUND.DATA.PATH(...)

Arguments

...

character vectors, if any values are NA, the result will also be NA. The paths follow the recycling rules used in the tibble package, namely that only length 1 arguments are recycled.

Value

A character string.

See also

Replaces dataprep.SetPaths().

MASTER.DATA.PATH

Other functions to output 2dii paths: find_dropbox_2dii()

Examples

fs::path_file(fs::path_home())
#> [1] "runner"
# Shortcut
USER.NAME()
#> [1] "runner"
DROPBOX.PATH()
#> Warning: `DROPBOX.PATH()` is deprecated as of r2dii.utils 0.0.0.
#> Please use `path_dropbox_2dii()` instead.
#> This warning is displayed once every 8 hours.
#> Call `lifecycle::last_warnings()` to see where this warning was generated.
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)
GIT.PATH()
#> Warning: This directory doesn't exist:
#> '/Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/2° Investing Team/People/runner/GitHub'
#> Do you need to create it?
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/2° Investing Team/People/runner/GitHub
WEBTOOL.PATH()
#> Warning: This directory doesn't exist:
#> '/Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/2° Investing Team/People/runner/GitHub/Webtool-v2'
#> Do you need to create it?
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/2° Investing Team/People/runner/GitHub/Webtool-v2
COMPANY.PATH()
#> Warning: This directory doesn't exist:
#> '/Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/2° Investing Team/People/runner/GitHub/CompanyAnalysis'
#> Do you need to create it?
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/2° Investing Team/People/runner/GitHub/CompanyAnalysis
dbox_port_00("a", "directory")
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck/00_Data/a/directory
SCENARIO.DATA.PATH()
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck/00_Data/01_ProcessedData/03_ScenarioData
dbox_port2_10proj("a", "directory")
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck_v2/10_Projects/a/directory
EQMARKET.DATA.PATH()
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck_v2/10_Projects/0_MarketPortfolios/21_EQMarketSize_Inputs
MARKET.DATA.PATH()
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck_v2/10_Projects/0_MarketPortfolios/20_Raw_Inputs
INDEX.DATA.PATH()
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck_v2/10_Projects/0_Indices/20_Raw_Inputs
INDEX.RESULTS.DATA.PATH()
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck_v2/10_Projects/0_Indices/40_Results
FUND.DATA.PATH()
#> /Users/runner/Dropbox (2° Investing)/PortCheck_v2/10_Projects/0_FundPortfolios/20_Raw_Inputs
